title: Curse card

{{obsolete}} ''This page refers to the [[card]] found in magical decks. For the game mechanic, see [[curse]].'' {{flavour|The card depicts unravelling bandages coated in sigils.}} The '''Curse''' card [[curse]]s items in the player's inventory, with the number of items depending on the power level: * Power level 0: Curses 1d2 items in the player's inventory. * Power level 1: Curses one or more items; after each item cursed, there is a 75% chance that it will curse another. (On average four items may be cursed by this, but with bad enough luck an entire pack could get cursed.) * Power level 2: As power level 1, but the chance of continuing is 99.9%. ==History== The Curse card could be found in the following [[Decks|decks]] over the past several versions. {| class="prettytable" ![[0.11]] ![[0.12]] ![[0.13]] ![[0.14]] ![[0.15]] ![[0.16]] ![[0.17]] ![[0.18]] |---- !style="text-align:left;vertical-align:top;font-weight:normal"| [[Deck of oddities|Oddities]]
